root.name: Suzumiya Haruhi no Gekidou
root.description: OverviewSuzumiya Haruhi no Gekidou is a rhythm game in which you dance by swinging the Wii mote in the appropriate direction when prompted. Â A continuation of the Suzumiya Haruhi series, you play as an SOS Brigade member in order to investigate supernatural happenings. The game includes several new Haruhi songs, as well as returning themes such as Hare Hare Yukai. There are new mini games, including Jankenpon (Rock, Paper, Scissors).
